bug.author: jrhone
bug.description:
bokehjs 2.0 needs pybokeh 2.0 to work We have bokehjs 2.0 pinned in our package.json But pybokeh 2.0 requires python>=3.6 bokeh is failing on python 3.5
Charts do not appear

comments.comment: Streamlit now requires Python 3.6+. Users running into issues with pybokeh 2.0 should first upgrade to the most recent version of Streamlit to see if their issue is resolved.
